column4: hi there, i'm planing to install ubuntu 12.04 as a single boot on a Macbook Air, and i'm quite scary to brick it... I'll need handholding :)
Pretty hard to brick an apple.  You can always recover with their system disk.
it's a macbook air and i've no usb disk drive so i feel quite naked in the cold if I broke the boot...
So get yourself the tools you need.
